about_the_game:
Get ready to immerse yourself in a legendary odyssey like you've never experienced before! In the amazing video game, you will become the last defender of mankind, a superhero imbued with incredible supernatural powers.your destiny is intertwined with an epic adventure that will take you through fantastic worlds and confront you with unimaginable challenges.

In this captivating narrative, you will find yourself bonded to a powerful and captivating succubus. With her ability to seduce, she will become your valuable ally. You will have to face ruthless enemies and unleash all your heroic potential to overcome all obstacles.

In your mission to return home, you will find yourself at the crossroads of lovingly conquering queens and princesses, captivating their hearts to win their support in this desperate struggle. The bonds of love will become your greatest strength as you enter a web of intrigue, romance and divided loyalties.
Enjoy incredible adult animation scenes (All adult content is created using stylized 3D models).

On your epic journey, you will cross breathtaking landscapes that will take your breath away.
Ancient and mysterious forests will envelop you in their lush greenery, hiding ancient secrets and unexpected dangers. The scorching deserts, with their endless sand dunes, will be a relentless challenge to your endurance and cunning. And the vast snowy steppes, shrouded in an icy white blanket, will test your determination and your ability to survive.

With each step you take, you will discover more about yourself and the true purpose of your superhuman powers. The fate of your world rests on your shoulders, and only through your bravery, intelligence and true love will you be able to overcome all the challenges that stand in your way.

Sexual Super Hero is more than just a video game: it is an epic experience that will immerse you in a vibrant world full of emotions.

content_descriptors.notes:
Your character will be able to interact with women with whom you can have consensual sex.
All adult animations are created with stylized 3D models.

name: Sexual Super Hero

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 | AMD Radeon HD 6870
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: i7
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1070 | AMD Radeon HD 6870
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Live the life of a super hero who must romance the queens and princesses of a parallel world to save his own world.
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Japanese
